message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split is beneficial for both of us.
I think we can both do better with a more balanced split. This offer is fairer and will give us both a good starting point.
Bob, time is money!  Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at your share even more. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand the time pressure, but I believe we can find a more agreeable solution that benefits both of us. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair share. Let's try one more time before inflation takes its toll.
